storyInfo: What has happened has happened. Kal'tsit rushes back to Babel, but it is too late. Through the already crowned Amiya, Theresa elaborates on her ultimate ideal to Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Theresa holds the hands of the one before her, as if it were their first meeting.
She quietly faces the other pair of eyes, looking at the emotions shifting within until finally, only a void remains.
She knows then, every memory has been wiped clean, the soul purified.
Your memory is gone, and your soul reborn...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A truly terrible trick...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But they underestimate your benevolence, your desire for victory. They underestimate us, and what makes Terra so tenacious.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor. Allow me to call you by this name for the last time...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This is my little revenge on you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: And also... my final gift to you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Memory does not shape who you are. So, with your original self...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Live again... on this land. See the world, feel the various emotions life brings, meet the many people of Terra...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perhaps... your journey will start in suffering, and you may never manage to escape the murky moon shadows of this land, but you will always... get to see the sun rise.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I trust you will find a new solution. One that is truly your own.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: An answer that... sounds just like the murmur Kal'tsit and I once heard...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A most moving answer.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Life slips away.
Her ears gradually pick up an elegy from afar. Laqeramaline did establish a connection with her after all.
Theresa feels her own breath growing feebler, but she also feels unprecedentedly relieved.
She tries her best to keep Amiya in her arms, protected. Amiya's heartbeat calms her own.
I'm... a little tired. It's exhausting, holding onto that crown.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I should rest when I'm tired. Isn't that right, Amiya?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I once imagined that...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perhaps, one day... We'll be able to let everyone on this vast land fall into peaceful slumber.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It may take a long time to come, but maybe, you could see it for me...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Amiya, when you wake up...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You'll have to keep going.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: *sigh*—I'm so tired...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No, she's not here yet...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: She clings to her final strand of remaining strength.
She is waiting for someone she must see.
Fortunately, the sound of her footsteps already draws near.
And then finally, even though she no longer has the strength to keep her eyes open, she knows—
She is here—
Kal'tsit...
Kal'tsit.
Theresa...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya... Doctor...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I knew full well this possibility always existed... Why...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I should have stayed behind—it's my...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The...resa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... We should have...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa... confirmed... dead.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mon3tr, heed my command...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Prepare... for any follow up attacks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Doctor and Amiya... nothing must happen to them. Protect them at all costs!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mon3tr—!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...
Kal'tsit.
Amiya opens her eyes, pink rhombuses faintly visible in her pupils.
Theresa's eyes remain shut tight.
But Kal'tsit knows.
It's her.
Kal'tsit... I've been waiting for you.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Theresa! I—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's alright, Kal'tsit. It's fine.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Listen to me—
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I'm already dead.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: What you see now is my consciousness put into the crown. I'm borrowing the body of this girl to bid you farewell.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, tell me. Did you raise Babel's banner high up in the sky over Kazdel?
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I sent it back to Kazdel, and watched it ascend myself...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I came back too late, I knew there might be a possibility...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't blame yourself for this, Kal'tsit. You had your own mission to fulfil.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: And... I managed to hold this long for you, and that's enough.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: ...Are we, running out of time to say our goodbyes?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please don't blame yourself for this.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: We trusted the Doctor, and I hope you can continue on our path into the future.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, there's no need for any further misgivings.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I took a life, but I also saved it.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: So please, take it to where it should be, if it can wake again...
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Guide it, and it will in turn lead us to the end of our path—
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I have no doubt about that.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However... we can no longer take the risk of venturing into... the depths of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will entrust someone I know to send the Doctor to Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Chernobog will be safe. It is too... dangerous to allow the Doctor to stay on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's good... Kal'tsit. I'll leave the rest to Amiya then.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: She will walk a difficult road.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: I will be with her, and Babel... as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She is so young, but so strong.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, giving the crown to Babel... to her, I did not do this on a selfish whim.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: To break the cycle and deal with what is to come... The King cannot only be a King of the Sarkaz, nor can it only be a King of Terra.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: The role is no fetter, controller, or unparalleled power.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: The role is a key. The King is... 'Civilight Eterna'.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: But Kal'tsit, keep this a secret from Amiya. She doesn't need to bear all of that now.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: She will understand once she embarks on that path, she needs to understand—
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Only by overcoming every obstacle can we find the doors that lead to this world.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: ...And you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will be gone in the pursuit of my ideal. As for her...
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: She will become the flame that burns all corruption to ashes.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.text: 'Kal'tsit, a new war is about to begin.'
'He will descend unto the cradle in Victoria that belongs to us, and Originium will cover that patch of land...'

attributes.content: She is leaving us.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 'He will bring suffering to the other races on this land...'

attributes.content: While you will become the final struggle for her ideals.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: A last-ditch effort.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 'He will make everyone else on Terra see the Sarkaz as enemies once more.'

attributes.content: Deathmongers—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Do not attempt to abandon your efforts, before her end is set...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Prove to me that her path still holds the chance to win a future—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 'Prevent that day from turning true, before everything becomes irreversible...'

attributes.content: Prove to her the peace you strive for is still worth a response.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Though I regret to say this, my compatriots...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The call to repay this blood debt is already resonating throughout this great land—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 'Kazdel's hatred should not continue to spread.'

attributes.content: Her death has been determined.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You have lost a Sarkaz King.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I have lost my only kin.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And I will not let these sacrifices be in vain.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: My people—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Whether you've come for peace or vengeance—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I will hear your voices.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You will see where the Sarkaz's true path lies.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The blood with which you stain the steps of Victoria will eventually return to where it belongs—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: We must make this place a new beginning for us.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.text: 'I can still hear the Sarkaz voices even now, Kal'tsit...'
'The closer I get to the myriad souls, the clearer their voices become.'
'What I can glean from their shouts and cries is—'

attributes.content: Suffering will descend once more—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: All of Terra will surrender—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Starting from this very spot.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: —Will rise again.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: We have to stop him, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: But... that's not something Babel can do, as it is now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You'll find a way.
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Besides, you'll never be alone. With the Babel we built together—
attributes.name: 'Amiya'

attributes.content: Your Highness—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Theresa...! Your Highness...! Your Highness!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: ...Your Highness...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'm back, Your Highness...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You would always welcome me back here when I returned.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: But this time... you're not here.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Can you still hear me...?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Why couldn't you wait a little longer...?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: ...Damn it! Damn it all!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'll make them pay... this I swear to you.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Every single one...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Even if it's... even if—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Master... Theresis—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Theresis...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: He must face me... I... I have to find him!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: All traitors... will suffer...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Your Highness Theresa... Theresis...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: My... only two... I couldn't...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Clouds cover the setting sun, and Ascalon is shrouded in shadow.
She has lost her light, her faith, forever.
She struggled. She strived.
Only death remains for the one born in the storm.

attributes.text: 'They are the most remarkable of all.'

attributes.content: ...Logos.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We... I don't know... we should...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Let's retreat first.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Let's... return to Babel.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.text: 'They will never doubt our ideals, even for a second.'

attributes.content: ...It's over.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: Why...? Why I feel...
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: I too am baffled, King of the Nachzehrers.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: I thought I was long accustomed to a King of Sarkaz's demise.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.text: 'Those—the ones left behind, you do not need to question their loyalty.'

attributes.content: ...No way.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who sent this *Sarkaz expletive* comm? Did the Military Commission intercept this? Are they screwing with us?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't believe it... I... Shut the hell up! Scout!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The landship... should be this way!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Theresa... she couldn't have just... died like that!!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Winter of 898, The King of Sarkaz dies.
Yliš dies and Kazdel falls into ruin.
The explosion of the Soul Furnace sends dust flying all across Kazdel's territory for three whole days and nights...
Finally, it falls to the ground like black snowflakes.
Burying the bones of the invaders.
Along with the ruin once known as 'Kazdel'.
Kazdel... is no more.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: But Kazdel has never been gone for good.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: That's what I heard from the King of Sarkaz. He said Kazdel has met with ruin more than three thousand times, but it will always eventually be rebuilt anew.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perhaps that was just a ploy by Yliš to deceive the people.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: He's dead, Theresis.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But even if it were only a tale he spun while wasting away in the palace... I could, at the very least, sense a strand of longing from his stories.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A yearning for a stable life.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What happens after victory? Now, everyone will only begin wandering the land once more...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Our people will praise us as heroes, but we can only return to ruins devoid of life.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What can we even do now?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 'Heroes'... Once this war is over, that title will be meaningless...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Also... I seem to have picked up the myriad souls whispering in my ear from a while ago...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Their voices are becoming even more distinct...
attributes.name: Theresa
Theresa
attributes.content: I don't know where the myriad souls hope to lead me...

attributes.name: Theresa
attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.joined: I don't know where the myriad souls hope to lead me...What about you?

attributes.content: I hear the same.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: I dismissed it as a delusion brought on by the euphoria of victory... but it seems to be more than that.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The myriad souls beckon us.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Then let's go, to wherever they beckon.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Yliš, King of Sarkaz, rests here for eternity.
Underneath a massive mountain of corpses.
In the far future, not a single soul will know there was once a King who died here.
He was so mediocre, so ordinary.
The Sarkaz do not remember the defeated.
In this war that changed their fate, the people will only remember the names of six incomparably dazzling heroes.
Here we are.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I remember this place... It was here we gathered to swear our oaths and join the battle, after Yliš's chariot was destroyed.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: This is where we started...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: A clothesmaker, and a guard.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Did you hear that, Theresis?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The myriad souls speak from under our feet...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: There it is.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: To think it was this small.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The crown.
With death as a witness—
As well as the myriad souls—
The twins raise the crown in unison.
The crown chooses the twins in return.
Atop the ruins, the myriad souls, whose existence remains uncertain, select two distinct hopes at a time.
...You should wear the crown, Theresa.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz is but an optimistic fantasy for the pitiful when history chooses to stay silent.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Indeed... we will change the Sarkaz's fate, with or without relying on an external force.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But in this age of despair, it will bring a glimmer of hope to our people.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I'm not fit to be that hope bringer.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: My blade will cut our path forward. And you will lead the way.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: ...I understand.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The war has just ended. How long will we bear this crown?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Until we find a home again. Until the Black Crown swallows us into its suffering...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Until everyone under the same sky can fall into a peaceful slumber.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 'Lead the way forward', you said. Do you still remember that adventure of ours?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You held your sword and carried me...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: And you guided me through the bushes until we got home.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Theresa...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Allow me to crown you myself.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresis...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I swear this vow to every Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Theresa
